'''Star Wars Rebels Skin Pack'''<ref>{{Cite|url=https://www.starwars.com/news/star-wars-rebels-skin-pack-comes-to-minecraft-for-xbox|title=''Star Wars Rebels'' Skin Pack Comes to ''Minecraft'' for Xbox|date=February 10, 2015|website=starwars.com}}</ref> is a [[skin pack]] that includes 23 skins of characters from the science fiction television series ''{{W|Star Wars Rebels}}''.

== Quotes ==
{{Quote|Are you ready to join the rebellion - Minecraft style? The Star Wars Rebels Skin Pack features the crew of the Ghost and their adversaries in the Galactic Empire. Chose from over 20 skins and play as your favorite Star Wars Rebels characters.|Minecraft Marketplace description}}
